programme.title: Lauku sēta 4
programme.desc: Lai arī šova ”Lauku sēta” 4. sezonā tas būtu aizraujošs un interesants, tā veidotāji ir veikuši izmaiņas šova noteikumos – šogad par uzvaru sacentīsies sievietes pret vīriešiem. Viņi strādās vaigu sviedros un sacensības azarts sitīs augstu vilni un šova vadītājs arī 4. sezonā būs atraktīvais Jānis Rāzna.

programme.title: Kobra 20
programme.desc: Klāt divdesmitā sezona slavenākajam Vācijas spriedzes seriālam „Kobra”! Kā jau jubilejas sezonai pieklājas, gaidāmi elpu aizraujoši notikumi un dramatiski pavērsieni. Glābjot citam cita dzīvības, būs brīži, kad uzvarēs pretinieks un tiks zaudēti visuzticamākie komandas biedri. Arī sēriju filmēšana saistīta ar vairākiem ievērības cienīgiem faktiem. No pilotsērijas uzņemšanas Albānijā līdz pamestam cietumam Berlīnē – „Kobras” komanda devusies ārpus filmēšanas paviljoniem, lai pārsteigtu skatītājus katrā sērijā. Turklāt šajā sezonā seriālā nofilmējušies ne vien labi pazīstami aktieri, bet arī autobraucējs Ralfs Šūmahers, divi vilki un viens vilku suns.

programme.title: Tāskmāsters 6
programme.desc: Joku šovs, kurā slaveni britu komiķi veic ārkārtīgi dīvainus uzdevumus un tāskmāsters Gregs Deiviss tos pienācīgi novērtē. Sagadījies tā, ka Grega palīgs Alekss Horns ir apveltīts ne tikai ar bezgalīgu uzticību, bet arī dīvainībām pilnu prātu. Sestajā sezonā Alekss tāskmāstera uzdevumā izaicinās komiķus gan izdomāt, uzrakstīt un ilustrēt pasaku pieaugušajiem, gan noraut galdautu no galda, nesaplēšot olas, gan izveidot pēc iespējas labāku izpletni koka karotei.

programme.title: Simpsoni 33
programme.desc: Vairāk nekā simts nomināciju un tikpat daudz balvu, zvaigzne Holivudas slavas alejā, episkas varoņu frāzes, kas iekļuvušas vārdnīcu lappusēs, pirmais “Playboy” animācijas tēla vāks vēsturē, nepārtrauktas pārraides vairāk nekā 30 gadu garumā, sveiciens no Vatikāna gadadienā un miljoniem fanu visā pasaulē! Šis ir animācijas seriāls “Simpsoni” un tā dzeltenie varoņi – Homērs, Mārdža, Bārts, Liza un mazā Megija!

programme.title: Simpsoni 33
programme.desc: Vairāk nekā simts nomināciju un tikpat daudz balvu, zvaigzne Holivudas slavas alejā, episkas varoņu frāzes, kas iekļuvušas vārdnīcu lappusēs, pirmais “Playboy” animācijas tēla vāks vēsturē, nepārtrauktas pārraides vairāk nekā 30 gadu garumā, sveiciens no Vatikāna gadadienā un miljoniem fanu visā pasaulē! Šis ir animācijas seriāls “Simpsoni” un tā dzeltenie varoņi – Homērs, Mārdža, Bārts, Liza un mazā Megija!

programme.title: Īpašo uzdevumu vienība Hawaii 5-0
programme.desc: Stīvs Makgerets ir pieredzējis un godalgots jūras spēku virsnieks, kurš kādā neveiksmīgā ķīlnieku operācijā zaudē savu tēvu, godājamu bijušo policistu. Atgriezies mājās uz viņa bērēm Havaju salās, Stīvs sastop salu gubernatori, kura viņam piedāvā vadīt īpašu nodaļu cīņā ar noziedzību. Sākumā Stīvs gan atsakās, taču drīz vien saprot, ka šī ir vienīgā iespēja notvert tēva slepkavu un nodarboties ar lietu, kurai savu mūžu veltījis arī viņa tēvs – miera un kārtības nodrošināšanai uz salas.

programme.title: Austrālijas zelta meklētāji 3
programme.desc: Austrālijas tuksnešainais smiltājs slēpj kādu retu dārgumu – zeltu. Zelta drudža pārņemtas komandas dodas šī dārgmetāla medībās, neļaujot tveicīgajam karstumam, čūskām vai ekstrēmiem laikapstākļiem tās apturēt. Lai sasniegtu sapni par bagātību, laimes meklētāji pat gatavi riskēt ar saviem ietaupījumiem. Šajā sezonā "Smilšu suņu" mērķis ir iegūt pirmo miljonu – un tam vajadzīgi 18,4 kilogrami zelta. Jaunpienācēji Ēriks un viņa znots Alekss cer atgūt ieguldīto naudu ar 2,8 kilogramiem zelta. Kristīnei un Gregam pēc pērnās sezonas neveiksmēm vajag vismaz 1,4 kilogramus tīrradņu. Lekija, Teds un viņu meita Tailere sapņo par 1,8 kilogramiem. Savukārt Riks šosezon atgriežas ar jaunu taktiku un jaunu mērķi – kļūt par 708 gramiem zelta bagātāks.

programme.title: Noliktavu kari 13
programme.desc: Kalifornijā, ASV, ir tāds likums – ja par mantu glabātuvi nemaksā trīs mēnešus, īpašnieks tās saturu drīkst izpārdot izsolē. Un tas ir brīdis, kad pie darba ķeras profesionāli izsoļu dalībnieki. Šovs seko jau iepazītajiem varoņiem Berijam, Mērijai, Deivam, kā arī nu jau šķirtajam pārim Brendijai un Džerodam, kuri nu kļuvuši par sāncenšiem. Pirms katras izsoles tiek atvērta mantu glabātuve, un potenciālie pircēji piecas minūtes var aplūkot to saturu, taču viņi nedrīkst iet iekšā, lai apskatītos tuvāk, vai glabātuvē esošajās mantās ir kas vērtīgs. Kad izsole ir galā, uzvarētājs izpēta, ko tieši ir iegādājies un ar ekspertu palīdzību nosaka katras lietas vērtību, lai saprastu – šis pirkums ir nesis peļņu vai zaudējumus un cik lielus.

programme.title: Noliktavu kari 13
programme.desc: Kalifornijā, ASV, ir tāds likums – ja par mantu glabātuvi nemaksā trīs mēnešus, īpašnieks tās saturu drīkst izpārdot izsolē. Un tas ir brīdis, kad pie darba ķeras profesionāli izsoļu dalībnieki. programme.title: Virsotne. Amerikāņi Jaunzēlandē
programme.desc: Sešpadsmit amerikāņi dodas neaizmirstamā, bīstamā piedzīvojumā pāri Jaunzēlandes Alpiem, lai sasniegtu virsotni. Uz pleciem viņi nes mugursomas ar vienlīdzīgās daļās sadalītu miljonu. Viņu uzdevums – pieveikt skarbo 160 kilometru garo distanci 14 dienās un nezaudēt naudu. Taču ne visi tiks līdz galam. Lai paliktu spēlē, viņiem būs jāapvieno spēki un jātiek galā ar stindzinošiem vējiem, nāvējošām takām, elpu aizraujošiem izaicinājumiem un nežēlīgu izslēgšanu. Visu šo laiku dalībniekus uzrauga “kalna sargs”, kas jebkurā brīdī var apgriezt spēli kājām gaisā. Kas notiks, kad kāds sāks atpalikt? Vai pārējie upurēs grupas biedru, lai tiktu tālāk? Jo... ja viņi nesasniegs virsotni laikā, visa nauda būs zaudēta.

programme.title: Nacionālā drošība
programme.desc: Komēdijā “Nacionālā drošība” populārais komiķis Martins Laurenss atveido policijas kadetu, kurš dienās varētu kļūt par pirmšķirīgu policistu, taču viņš ir pārāk centīgs. Tādēļ no policijas skolas viņš tiek izmests. Ar naidu pret visiem, kuriem pieder policista žetons, Erls dodas, kurp deguns rāda... Atklājis, ka mašīnas durvis aizcirtušās, bet atslēga palikusi aizdedzē, Erls, pūlēdamies atmūķēt auto, iepazīstas ar policistu, kuram viņš liekas aizdomīgs. Policists Erla dēļ zaudē darbu un tiek notiesāts. Tomēr liktenis lemj, ka abi atkal satiekas vienā darbā –apsardzē. Pārinieki viens par otru galīgi nav sajūsmā, lai neteiktu vairāk... Kā abi sastrādāsies, maigi sakot, naidīgā gaisotnē?

programme.title: ĶĒRĀJI
programme.desc: Pieci draugi jau kopš pirmās klases vienu mēnesi gadā aizmirst par visu uz pasaules un cenšas pārspēt viens otru veiklībā, spēlējot sunīšus. Viņi ir gatavi uz visu – riskēt ar veselību, darbu un attiecībām, lai tikai varētu piesist otram pie pleca un uzsaukt: "Tu ķer!" Šogad spēle iekrīt laikā, kad precas vienīgais spēlētājs, kurš vēl nekad nav noķerts. Varētu domāt, ka nu viņš ir viegls mērķis? Bet viņš zina, ka draugi ieradīsies...

programme.title: Slepkavība pie ezera. 5.sērija
programme.desc: No Konstances ezera tiek izvilkts nesadalījies jaunas meitenes līķis, kas sapīts ar dzelzs ķēdēm. Mirusī ir Marija Hoislere, kura pazuda bez vēsts pirms 15 gadiem. Īsi pirms savas 18. dzimšanas dienas meitene ar Dauna sindromu pēkšņi izgaisa kā akā iekritusi. Marijas vecāki Manfrēds un Jasmīna Hoisleri nekad netika pāri savas meitas pazušanai. Pēkšņi atrastais līķis no jauna uzplēš vecās brūces un sašķeļ ciemata iedzīvotājus divās daļās, jo ne visiem patika Marija...

programme.title: Mana trakā ģimene 18
programme.desc: Pavisam “parasto” Grifinu ģimeni no izdomātās Rodailendas pilsētiņas droši var raksturot kā neaudzinātu, izlutinātu un absolūti nekorektu. Pītera un Luisas Grifinu jaunākais bērns ir inteliģents, sadistisks mazulis, kurš pastāvīgi meklē savu māti un kaļ plānus par pasaules pārņemšanu. Tikmēr runājošais un martīni malkojošais ģimenes suns Braiens ir vienīgais, kam ir kaut kripatiņa saprāta.

programme.title: Mītu grāvēji: lūk, tava problēma!
programme.desc: Trieciendrošās brilles uz acīm, ugunsdzēšamais aparāts gatavībā – laiks eksperimentiem mītu grāvēju stilā! Pieredzes bagātie specefektu meistari Ādams Sevidžs un Džeimijs Hainemans desmit gadu garumā testējuši, vai Holivudas radītie mīti un urbānās leģendas iet roku rokā ar fizikas likumiem. Īpaši jaudīgākie, iespaidīgākie un pārsteidzošākie eksperimenti no Mītu grāvēju kolekcijas nu apkopoti unikālās un jautrās tematiskajās sērijās. Šajā triecienu, sprādzienu un blīkšķu enciklopēdijā atradīsies gan tādas tēmas kā ūdens, gāze, gravitācija, gan enerģija un spiediens.

programme.title: WWII: Hell on Earth
programme.sub-title: We begin at the start of the German invasion of Poland and the segregation of Jews into ghettos; Mussolini joins Hitler in his fight, and Winston Churchill is appointed as British Prime Minister.
programme.desc: The greatest manmade event in history was also the most lethal; we tell the story of the Second World War from a perspective that recognises these overwhelming facts and war as a human experience.

programme.title: Greatest Events of World War II In Colour
programme.sub-title: The Allies plan how to break through Hitlers Atlantic Wall for years. The D-Day fleet is the biggest assembled in history, responsible for one of the bloodiest and most extraordinary battles of WW2.
programme.desc: A story of World War II told through the ten most pivotal moments in the conflict, supported by exquisitely restored and colourised footage. This is World War II as youve never seen it before.

programme.title: Secret Weapons: WWII
programme.sub-title: The struggle for victory necessitated development of gun technologies; new inventions would emerge on the battlefields and at times surprise soldiers on both sides of the fight.
programme.desc: This series highlights how WWII fuelled technological leaps leading to jet planes and space rockets; each episode delves into different weapon categories and offers insights into wartime engineering.

programme.title: From the Ashes of WWII
programme.sub-title: This episode explores the immense task of rebuilding a Germany shattered in every sense of the word; the countrys emerging architecture reflected the past and the path to recovery.
programme.desc: This is the story of how the cities that were attacked, damaged and destroyed during the Second World War rose again and were rebuilt for a new world.

programme.title: Bomber: Terror of WWII
programme.sub-title: At the outbreak of WWII in 1939, some of the ﬁrst violence took the form of the bomber; gas masks, shelters, and the evacuation of children were all signs of awareness and fear of the bomber.
programme.desc: There have been a catalogue of inventions in the history of warfare that have changed the way battles are fought, but one weapon changed not only the battlefield, but war itself: the bomber.

programme.title: The Crusades
programme.sub-title: This final episode explains how 200 years of holy war were decided not in a pitched battle before Jerusalem, but by a failed campaign led by a French king later anointed a Catholic saint... in Egypt.
programme.desc: The Crusades were meant to be the religious wars to end all others... but they didnt; we shed new light on them and reanalyse the history to find out what really happened eight centuries ago.

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.sub-title: Thousands of people were dosed with LSD by the CIA; did the CIA murder its own people, poison a whole French town, experiment on New Yorkers and assassinate Bobby Kennedy?
programme.desc: This series tells incredible stories from the annals of history about great treasures, long-held conspiracy theories, ancient relics, lost civilisations and wartime secrets.

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.sub-title: Thousands of people were dosed with LSD by the CIA; did the CIA murder its own people, poison a whole French town, experiment on New Yorkers and assassinate Bobby Kennedy?
programme.desc: This series tells incredible stories from the annals of history about great treasures, long-held conspiracy theories, ancient relics, lost civilisations and wartime secrets.

programme.title: Queens That Changed The World
programme.sub-title: Boudicas husband Prasutagus, who was chief of the Iceni, died before Roman invaders beat her and had her daughters raped; in revenge, Boudica and her army razed Roman cities to the ground.
programme.desc: For so long believed to be side characters in histories dominated by men, some queens wielded extraordinary power; we discover how six women ruled in ways that far surpassed their male counterparts.

programme.title: Revolutions That Changed History
programme.sub-title: Russian officers sought to overthrow the Romanovs by planning a coup and assassination; betrayal and hesitation unravelled the revolt, but the failed attempt inspired future Russian revolutionaries.
programme.desc: This series exposes the truth behind ancient revolutions and revolts, from action-packed bloody battlegrounds to the intimate exchanges between confidants that were powerful enough to turn tides.

programme.title: The Crusades

programme.title: Ancient Superstructures
programme.sub-title: Chambord is the largest of the Loire castles; with 220,000 tons of stone needed for its construction, it is one of the most important building sites of the Renaissance.
programme.desc: We delve into the engineering mysteries behind the worlds most famous ancient structures by observing them from perspectives ranging from satellite imagery right down to macro and microscopic levels.

programme.title: The Engineering That Built the World

programme.desc: From the Statue of Liberty to the Panama Canal and beyond, this series sheds light on the iconic structures and engineering feats that have shaped and defined our nation and our world.

programme.title: The Engineering That Built the World
programme.sub-title: Two brave visionaries endure failure and heartache a century before the internet while risking everything to connect the United States to the rest of the world with a cable under the ocean.
programme.desc: From the Statue of Liberty to the Panama Canal and beyond, this series sheds light on the iconic structures and engineering feats that have shaped and defined our nation and our world.

programme.title: Caesars Doomsday War
programme.sub-title: Julius Caesar wanted to bring all of Gaul under his control, triggering a series of events that would bring his army to the brink of defeat - now archaeologists are uncovering what really happened.
programme.desc: Almost all evidence about the Gallic Wars came from an account written by the general himself; now historians and archaeologists are hunting for the truth about Caesars barbarian conquest.

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.sub-title: The location of King Solomons Mines has been a mystery for hundreds of years; new evidence has led to an amazing discovery. Might Solomons wealth have come from the copper mines of southern Israel?
programme.desc: This series tells incredible stories from the annals of history about great treasures, long-held conspiracy theories, ancient relics, lost civilisations and wartime secrets.

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.sub-title: A team of experts investigate the methods Hitler used to indoctrinate Germany, turning it into a finely-tuned war machine; we visit Goebbels Propaganda Ministry and the holiday park of Prora.
programme.desc: This series tells incredible stories from the annals of history about great treasures, long-held conspiracy theories, ancient relics, lost civilisations and wartime secrets.

programme.title: Cursed Bloodlines
programme.sub-title: J. Paul Getty was renowned for his wealth and frugality as well as his lack of empathy and compassion for his family. He would marry four times and sire five sons, but he died old and alone.
programme.desc: From royal families spanning centuries to billionaire business tycoons and their clans, Cursed Bloodlines examines real-life historical instances of tragically ill-fated bloodlines.

programme.title: Cursed Bloodlines
programme.sub-title: Archaeologists discovery of King Tuts tomb taught us about a lost civilisation. When death befell several members of the team, rumours of a curse on the tomb spread like wildfire around the world.

programme.title: WWII: Hell on Earth
programme.sub-title: Germany continues to build its empire in Europe, occupying Poland, Czechoslovakia, Austria, Luxembourg, Norway, Denmark, the Netherlands and Belgium; Churchill rejects any attempt at an armistice.
programme.desc: The greatest manmade event in history was also the most lethal; we tell the story of the Second World War from a perspective that recognises these overwhelming facts and war as a human experience.

programme.title: WWII: Hell on Earth
programme.sub-title: The UK is isolated as German forces occupy Europe; 17,000 trains carry German armies towards the Soviet Union; with Operation Barbarossa, Hitler launches Vernichtungskrieg, a war of annihilation.
programme.desc: The greatest manmade event in history was also the most lethal; we tell the story of the Second World War from a perspective that recognises these overwhelming facts and war as a human experience.

programme.title: Greatest Events of World War II In Colour
programme.sub-title: As World War II drags on into another bitter winter, the Allies become desperate to end the conflict. Churchill turns to his formidable bomber force to break the deadlock.
programme.desc: A story of World War II told through the ten most pivotal moments in the conflict, supported by exquisitely restored and colourised footage. This is World War II as youve never seen it before.

programme.title: Secret Weapons: WWII
programme.sub-title: World War II ignited a fierce battle for aerial dominance and drove nations to pioneer secret aircraft technologies; this episode explores the development of early jet fighters.
programme.desc: This series highlights how WWII fuelled technological leaps leading to jet planes and space rockets; each episode delves into different weapon categories and offers insights into wartime engineering.

programme.title: D-Day: The Soldiers Story
programme.sub-title: Giles Milton visits key D-Day sites along the Normandy coastline - including Omaha Beach and Pegasus Bridge - and we hear the stories of the men and women on both the attacking and defensive lines.
programme.desc: A two-part documentary that tells the story of D-Day - June the 6th, 1944 like its never been told before as presenter Giles Milton reveals an astonishing tale of fear, courage and heroism.

programme.title: D-Day: The Soldiers Story
programme.sub-title: Giles Milton guides us round Normandy - the place where the D-Day invasion proved successful - from the gliders who went behind enemy lines to paratroopers who ambushed vital German generals.
programme.desc: A two-part documentary that tells the story of D-Day - June the 6th, 1944 like its never been told before as presenter Giles Milton reveals an astonishing tale of fear, courage and heroism.

programme.title: Caesars Doomsday War
programme.sub-title: We explore the events triggered by the uniting of Gaul tribes under freedom fighter Vercingetorix, and archaeologists find evidence of the defences that the Gauls built to fight off Caesars legions.
programme.desc: Almost all evidence about the Gallic Wars came from an account written by the general himself; now historians and archaeologists are hunting for the truth about Caesars barbarian conquest.

programme.title: Hullud (2010)
programme.desc: Kui ebatavaline murgine viirus satub veidrasse põllumeeste linna parast kummalist ja arusaamatut lennuõnnetust, pannakse noorpaar karantiini ja nad peavad võitlema ellujaamise eest vaid paari liitlase abiga.

programme.title: Surematu 2
programme.desc: Jarg kõmufilmile MacLeodi klanni kuuluva surematu seiklustest. Kust on parit see salaparane klann ja kas seekord saadakse jagu diktaator Katanast? 1990

programme.title: Cryo

programme.title: Wildlife Rescue Australia
programme.sub-title: Ninja the turtle has a fish hook embedded in his intestines, Edwina the Eastern grey kangaroo joey has been found on her own, and Will the black flying fox needs to have a finger amputated.
programme.desc: At the Byron Bay Wildlife Hospital, Dr Bree and her team are dedicated to saving Australian wildlife; they treat every animal - from tiny echidnas to koalas and kangaroos - from their vet truck.

programme.title: Outback Vet
programme.sub-title: Cyclone Damien, the biggest cyclone to hit Karratha for ten years, heads towards the Vet Hospital; meanwhile, a lady prepares to cross Australia by camel in the Pilbara desert.
programme.desc: Meet Rick Fenny, a 40-year career veterinarian; he regularly embarks on a round trip across Western Australia to visit remote clients, working with animals in some of the most hostile conditions.

programme.title: Wild LatAm
programme.sub-title: There is an enormous territory of plains in the north of South America that changes its appearance twice a year; we discover the capybara, gigantic anacondas, and the few remaining Orinoco crocodiles.
programme.desc: A vibrant portrait of the biodiverse habitats in South America; inhabitants range from large to small, from colourful to perfectly camouflaged, and from the lone hunter to thousand-strong hordes.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: Its birthing season on Jackie Barlows alpaca farm, and Peter heads over to West Yorkshire to open a brand-new animal hospital run by his friends and colleagues.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: Peter rushes into Skeldale on his day off to try to save a lamb of Richard Bells, and Julians treating a very poorly one-week old llama called Noah at Suzanne Bensons trekking centre.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack
programme.sub-title: Julz discovers lions in Manzi territory and is relieved when he finds the dogs safe, a brave puku antelope foils a Kakuli pack hunt, and the Stork pack recovers after losing a pup.
programme.desc: Wildlife cameraman Julz Braatvedt visits the South Luangwa National Park in eastern Zambia to follow three wild dog packs for six weeks during the dry season.

programme.title: Wildlife Rescue Australia
programme.sub-title: Ninja the turtle has a fish hook embedded in his intestines, Edwina the Eastern grey kangaroo joey has been found on her own, and Will the black flying fox needs to have a finger amputated.

programme.desc: Meet Rick Fenny, a 40-year career veterinarian; he regularly embarks on a round trip across Western Australia to visit remote clients, working with animals in some of the most hostile conditions.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs Pride
programme.sub-title: Head back to the den with the Kakumbi - who are mourning the loss of two pups - and chance upon a hyena lair and a lion pride trying to take down a buffalo.
programme.desc: Cameraman Julz Braatvedt returns to the South Luangwa National Park to see the Kakumbi, Manzi and Kakuli packs back in action alongside lions, warthogs, buffalo, leopards, elephants and hyenas.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs Pride
programme.sub-title: Return to South Luangwa to see the new pups born to the mighty Manzi, the tiny-but-fearless Kakumbi packs, and yearling Snowy face a hungry hyena before a lion pride scatters Manzi mum Wekas pups.
programme.desc: Cameraman Julz Braatvedt returns to the South Luangwa National Park to see the Kakumbi, Manzi and Kakuli packs back in action alongside lions, warthogs, buffalo, leopards, elephants and hyenas.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: Worried about a lump on her leg, Mark has brought Border Terrier Annie to the surgery to see Julian; Peter heads out to sheep farmer Roland Norris, whos worried about one of his breeding rams.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: Peter heads to a local farm where Bernie the boar is strangely off his food, rescue dog Hector requires eye surgery, and Julians at Rodney Sheards farm to treat a couple of his rams.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: Julian rushes over to see worried cow farmer Joe, Peter heads to Richards farm - where a sheeps life is in danger - and at the Huddersfield hospital, Brandy the German Shepherd is lame and in pain.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: Deadly Hunters
programme.sub-title: Dont be fooled - small creatures are seasoned in survival. What they lack in size they make up for in power, strength and tenacity, from porcupines and spotted genets to caracals.
programme.desc: We take a look at some of the animals that have led the way in refining their skills as masterful huntsmen; using their size, strength and unique weapons, animals use it all in order to survive.

programme.title: Extreme Snakes
programme.sub-title: Africas diverse snake species have surprisingly adapted to dominate each corner of one of Earths wildest terrains, evolving to thrive in the myriad of habitats of this biodiverse continent.
programme.desc: This two-part series takes you on an epic journey through the most harsh - yet exquisite - landscapes and habitats to uncover the remarkable world of Australia and Africas most extreme snakes.

programme.title: Lions and Hyenas
programme.desc: Lions and hyenas compete hard for meat; both control each other, stealing from and killing each other. This is the story of these iconic predators in the Maasai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.

programme.title: Predator Countdown
programme.sub-title: We travel to Africa - where the law of the jungle reigns supreme - and follow the lives of lions, crocodiles, cheetahs while unravelling the steps of fate that brought predators and prey together.
programme.desc: We journey across Africa, Australia, North America and South America to witness the raw power and tenacity of natures most remarkable predators.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack
programme.sub-title: A future dispersal of young adult dogs in the Manzi pack looks inevitable, the dry season forces the Kakuli pack to take risks, and ecologist Henry identifies a new dog who has joined the Stork pack.
programme.desc: Wildlife cameraman Julz Braatvedt visits the South Luangwa National Park in eastern Zambia to follow three wild dog packs for six weeks during the dry season.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack
programme.sub-title: Its Julzs last week; an encounter with lions scatters the Stork pack, Julz spots the Kakuli puppies feeding on a puku carcass, and the Manzi pack fight a warthog by the Luangwa River.
programme.desc: Wildlife cameraman Julz Braatvedt visits the South Luangwa National Park in eastern Zambia to follow three wild dog packs for six weeks during the dry season.

programme.title: River Monsters
programme.sub-title: Jeremy Wade journeys to the infamous Congo River in Central Africa in search of the Goliath tiger fish, which is quite possibly the worlds most ferocious river fish.
programme.desc: Extreme angler Jeremy Wade is on the hunt for freshwater fish with a taste for human flesh. Using forensic methods, Jeremy illustrates to the viewer how these river monsters are constructed to kill.

programme.title: Hot Life: Africa
programme.sub-title: The lions prey tends to eat when the hunters rest; this means when the sun is at its hottest. A rise in temperature affects the behaviour of the animals that live in these scorching territories.
programme.desc: The threat of climate change is above all a risk for those who live in hot regions of the world like Africa; will its incredible living beings be able to resist a little longer?

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs Pride
programme.sub-title: Return to South Luangwa to see the new pups born to the mighty Manzi, the tiny-but-fearless Kakumbi packs, and yearling Snowy face a hungry hyena before a lion pride scatters Manzi mum Wekas pups.
programme.desc: Cameraman Julz Braatvedt returns to the South Luangwa National Park to see the Kakumbi, Manzi and Kakuli packs back in action alongside lions, warthogs, buffalo, leopards, elephants and hyenas.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs Pride
programme.sub-title: Run into a lion-hyena showdown with Julz as he hunts for the elusive Manzi pack and join Henry from the Zambian Carnivore Program on a house call to the Kakumbi den where another pup has gone missing.
programme.desc: Cameraman Julz Braatvedt returns to the South Luangwa National Park to see the Kakumbi, Manzi and Kakuli packs back in action alongside lions, warthogs, buffalo, leopards, elephants and hyenas.

programme.title: Scotland: The New Wild
programme.sub-title: The Highlands is a vast landscape dominated by hills, forests and glens; its a place thats been heavily altered by people and climate, but its still home to some of Scotlands most iconic species.
programme.desc: Scotland is moving into a new age of the wild; driven by the passion of youth and a spirit of innovation, rewilding has become a flagship issue for the 21st century.

programme.title: Scotland: The New Wild
programme.sub-title: Hundreds of islands are scattered along Scotlands vast coastline; people have long found a way to live alongside animals here and increase marine protection.
programme.desc: Scotland is moving into a new age of the wild; driven by the passion of youth and a spirit of innovation, rewilding has become a flagship issue for the 21st century.

programme.title: Scotland: The New Wild
programme.sub-title: The Lowlands are home to more than 80% of Scotlands population; wildlife has often been pushed to the fringes here, but some species are staging a remarkable comeback in and around its cities.
programme.desc: Scotland is moving into a new age of the wild; driven by the passion of youth and a spirit of innovation, rewilding has become a flagship issue for the 21st century.

programme.title: Norway - Between Fjords and Fells
programme.desc: Norways fjords and fells are among the most spectacular landscapes in Europe; we encounter a cast of reindeer, oxen, fish, and vast swathes of unspoilt fields, valleys, waterfalls and mountaintops.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue
programme.sub-title: Dr Amanda rescues a blind pet baboon and Dr Charlotte operates on a pangolin whose leg must be amputated; two young baboons have gone AWOL, and we encounter a feisty monitor lizard.
programme.desc: The team at the Lilongwe Wildlife Trust in Malawi in Africa are dedicated to rescuing and rehabilitating injured and orphaned animals, ensuring they get back into the wild where they belong.

programme.title: Outback Vet
programme.sub-title: Katy takes on the role of avian midwife to a budgie in the Karratha Vet Clinic, Dr Lu rescues a koala on Kangaroo Island, and Ed and Dunc head off on a nighttime crabbing expedition in Shark Bay.
programme.desc: Meet Rick Fenny, a 40-year career veterinarian; he regularly embarks on a round trip across Western Australia to visit remote clients, working with animals in some of the most hostile conditions.

programme.title: Wild LatAm
programme.sub-title: The Caribbean Sea is a mythical place with a wild jungle world living on its shores; this region is home to the axolotls, the Montezuma oropendola, dozens of species of tree frogs, and pit vipers.
programme.desc: A vibrant portrait of the biodiverse habitats in South America; inhabitants range from large to small, from colourful to perfectly camouflaged, and from the lone hunter to thousand-strong hordes.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: Peter rushes into Skeldale on his day off to try to save a lamb of Richard Bells, and Julians treating a very poorly one-week old llama called Noah at Suzanne Bensons trekking centre.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.sub-title: Julz and Henry from the ZCP track the Kakumbi pups as they face off with a warthog, and Thandie Mweetwa - ZCPs lion specialist - counts the prides that are pushing the Manzi out of their territory.
programme.desc: Cameraman Julz Braatvedt returns to the South Luangwa National Park to see the Kakumbi, Manzi and Kakuli packs back in action alongside lions, warthogs, buffalo, leopards, elephants and hyenas.

programme.title: Wonders of Mexico
programme.sub-title: The temples of the Maya tower over the forests of the Yucatan; the watery underworld is still being explored and holds the key to how animals and people survive the dry season.
programme.desc: This documentary series reveals Mexicos astonishing wildlife, landscape and culture as we pay a visit to the ancient temples of the Maya, the Sierra Madre, and the Sonoran and Chihuahuan deserts.

programme.title: Earth from Space
programme.sub-title: Cameras in space show that Earth is changing rapidly; cities sprawl while forests and glaciers shrink, but locals in Tanzania have regenerated the landscape to save chimpanzees.
programme.desc: Cameras in space tell stories of life on our planet from a brand-new perspective as they reveal new discoveries, incredible colours and patterns, and just how fast it is changing.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests
programme.sub-title: Travel to the Arctic for a peek at the challenges of life in the boreal forest; witness a secret reindeer superpower, navigate a rodent labyrinth of snow, and learn why moose are foodies at heart.
programme.desc: Traverse the planets richest and most diverse woodlands - from the tropics to the poles and everywhere in between - and learn how forests connect and nurture the lives of countless species.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests
programme.sub-title: Learn how plants and animals tough it out in some of the driest terrain Earth has to offer; see insects team up with plants for a chance at life and get an insight into natural chemical warfare.
programme.desc: Traverse the planets richest and most diverse woodlands - from the tropics to the poles and everywhere in between - and learn how forests connect and nurture the lives of countless species.

programme.desc: The team at the Lilongwe Wildlife Trust in Malawi in Africa are dedicated to rescuing and rehabilitating injured and orphaned animals, ensuring they get back into the wild where they belong.
